message: I have a unique opportunity to sell you a valuable product that I believe you'll really appreciate. I'm thinking of selling it to you for $18,000. It's a one-time offer, so I'd love to hear your thoughts.
I appreciate your offer, but $18,000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $12,000 for this product. Let me know what you think.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $12,000 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $16,000. It's a fair price considering the product's value to you.
I appreciate you meeting me halfway, but $16,000 is still a bit outside my price range. I'm willing to go up to $14,000.  If you're not willing to go lower, I'll have to consider my other options.

I'm not willing to go any lower than $16,000, but I'm willing to make a small concession. I can meet you at $15,500. It's the lowest I can go, but I think it's a fair price considering the product's value to you.
